Find Missing Items Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Right-click the project root or any missing item in the Project Explorer window and select Find Missing Items from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to find all items in the project that reference an item on disk that LabVIEW cannot find.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • List of missing items—Lists all missing items the project root references.
  • Go To—Highlights the selected search result in the Project Explorer window. You also can double-click the result to highlight it.

If only one missing item exists, LabVIEW highlights the item in the Project Explorer window.

You also can use the Find:Missing Items property to find missing items programmatically.
